Package io.github.javaf

Class Bit

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.javaf.Bit
  • public final class Bit
extends Object
    The bit is a basic unit of information in information theory, computing. This package includes bit twiddling hacks by Sean Eron Anderson and many others.
